argument.name: objectname
argument.description: The name of a Control Panel object.

argument.name: classname
argument.description: Optional. The name of class of objects. The following values are available.

page.description: Sets focus to the control panel object.
page.discussion: The CONTROLPANEL.SETFOCUS() method sets focus to the selected object. Note : You must have something already selected on the same Control Panel tab window for the function to work.
